description:
Paris, city of lights turned dark on you. You're young artist enjoying your life until one evening your girlfriend Sasha goes missing! 
You're the prime suspect. Only way to figure out what's going on is to take things into your own hands and investigate the whole case.
Is she being murdered or kidnapped? Who's the criminal mind behind everything? 

Use your detective skills and solve the mystery!

The game features dozens of puzzles and riddles to solve by finding clues, combining items and cracking the case bit by bit.
Thrilling adventure and story full of twists where only you can discover ends of it.

- Play the role of detective and investigate the tricky murder case
- Investigate locations in Paris and find clues to solve the crime
- Interview dozes of suspects in full interactive dialogues with voice overs
- Enjoy full cinematics as you move forward through your investigation 
- Earn achievements and find special items
name: The Man With The Ivory Cane
